main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Colorado Springs, Colorado, on April 24, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as dark with a luminous glow and had swept wings without a fuselage,It was reported to be 10 times larger than a jet aircraft,The object disappeared behind tree branches without making any sound during its flight,Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting,The object was in the backyard of a residential area, approximately 2,000 feet away.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a flying wing
witness description: a reliable individual with no technical experience in UFO observation
